messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] doom and gloom--cessation,and plea for critical thin...
messages.msgSnippet: I agree with this. My version says, Everyone thinks, everyone s a lot like me. I tend to think the same, even though I *know* I m very far from the
messages.messageBody:
I agree with this. My version says, "Everyone thinks, 'everyone's a lot like
me.'" I tend to think the same, even though I *know* I'm very far from the
mainstream.

:-) Diane

> My husband taught me a cool thing, years ago. I used to get really
> frustrated when I was in my 20's when people would make what seemed
> mysterious assumptions about my abilities or motives or something, and he
> said, "People assume that you are like they are."
